SELECT E.EMP_NM,CP.CP_NO, CP.CP_TYPE, CP.CP_NM, CP.CP_BIZ_NO, CP.CP_BIZ_NM, CP.CP_BIZ, CP.CP_EVENT, CP.CP_ADD_NO, CP.CP_ADD, CP.CP_ADD_DETAIL, CP.CP_PH1, CP.CP_PH2, CP.CP_PH, CP.CP_FAX, CP.CP_EMAIL, CP.CP_WEBSITE, CP.EMP_NO, CP.CP_MEMO ,TO_CHAR(CP.CP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CP_DATE, NVL(W.TDATE, '없음') AS TDATE FROM COMPANY_CODE CP INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CP.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT CP_NO , TDATE FROM (SELECT CP_NO ,TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TDATE, RANK()OVER (ORDER BY (TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) DESC) AS RNK FROM WAREHOUSING GROUP BY CP_NO ,TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) WHERE RNK = 1) W ON CP.CP_NO = W.CP_NO
where 1=1
AND CP_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_BIZ_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_BIZ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_BIZ LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_EVENT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_ADD_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_ADD LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_ADD_DETAIL LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_PH1 LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_PH2 LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_PH LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_FAX LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_PH LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_WEBSITE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_MEMO LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR TDATE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND CP_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND CP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
ORDER BY TDATE ASC

SELECT E.EMP_NM,CP.CP_NO, CP.CP_TYPE, CP.CP_NM, CP.CP_BIZ_NO, CP.CP_BIZ_NM, CP.CP_BIZ, CP.CP_EVENT, CP.CP_ADD_NO, CP.CP_ADD, CP.CP_ADD_DETAIL, CP.CP_PH1, CP.CP_PH2, CP.CP_PH, CP.CP_FAX, CP.CP_EMAIL, CP.CP_WEBSITE, CP.EMP_NO, CP.CP_MEMO ,TO_CHAR(CP.CP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CP_DATE, NVL(W.TDATE, '없음') AS TDATE FROM COMPANY_CODE CP INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CP.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT CP_NO , TDATE FROM (SELECT CP_NO ,TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TDATE, RANK()OVER (ORDER BY (TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) DESC) AS RNK FROM WAREHOUSING GROUP BY CP_NO ,TO_CHAR(WH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) WHERE RNK = 1) W ON CP.CP_NO = W.CP_NO WHERE CP.CP_NO = #{comp_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY_CODE(CP_NO, CP_TYPE, CP_NM, CP_BIZ_NO, CP_BIZ_NM, CP_BIZ, CP_EVENT, CP_ADD_NO, CP_ADD, CP_ADD_DETAIL, CP_PH1, CP_PH2, CP_PH, CP_FAX, CP_EMAIL, CP_WEBSITE, EMP_NO, CP_MEMO) VALUES(CP_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{cp_type},#{cp_nm},#{cp_biz_no},#{cp_biz_nm},#{cp_biz},#{cp_event},#{cp_add_no},#{cp_add},#{cp_add_detail},#{cp_ph1},#{cp_ph2},#{cp_ph},#{cp_fax},#{cp_email},#{cp_website},#{emp_no},#{cp_memo})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANY_CODE SET CP_TYPE = #{cp_type}, CP_NM = #{cp_nm}, CP_BIZ_NO =#{cp_biz_no}, CP_BIZ_NM =#{cp_biz_nm}, CP_BIZ =#{cp_biz}, CP_EVENT = #{cp_biz}, CP_ADD_NO = #{cp_add_no}, CP_ADD=#{cp_add}, CP_ADD_DETAIL = #{cp_add_detail}, CP_PH1 = #{cp_ph1}, CP_PH2 = #{cp_ph2}, CP_PH = #{cp_ph}, CP_FAX = #{cp_fax}, CP_EMAIL =#{cp_email}, CP_WEBSITE = #{cp_website}, EMP_NO = #{emp_no}, CP_MEMO = #{cp_memo} WHERE CP_NO = #{comp_no}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT I.IT_NO, I.IT_NM,SQ.CODE_NAME,CASE WHEN I.IT_VAT_CK='VAT포함' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS IT_VAT_CK ,NVL(I.IT_SAL_U_PRICE,0) AS IT_SAL_U_PRICE, NVL(CASE WHEN I.IT_VAT_CK='VAT포함' THEN I.IT_SAL_U_PRICE ELSE ROUND(I.IT_SAL_U_PRICE*1.1) END,0) AS IT_SAL_U_PRICE_VAT, NVL(I.IT_SAL_W_PRICE, 0) AS IT_SAL_W_PRICE , NVL(CASE WHEN I.IT_VAT_CK='VAT포함' THEN I.IT_SAL_W_PRICE ELSE ROUND(I.IT_SAL_W_PRICE*1.1) END,0) AS IT_SAL_W_PRICE_VAT, NVL(I.IT_MONEY_PT,0) AS IT_MONEY_PT,NVL(I.IT_CARD_PT,0) AS IT_CARD_PT,I.CP_NO, CP.CP_NM,NVL(I.IT_STD, 0) AS IT_STD,NVL(I.IT_UNIT, 0) AS IT_UNIT, TO_CHAR(I.IT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IT_DATE FROM ITEM_CODE I INNER JOIN COMPANY_CODE CP ON I.CP_NO = CP.CP_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE_M_CATE,CODE_S_CATE,CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_L_CATE = 1) SQ ON I.IT_M_GROUP_NO = SQ.CODE_M_CATE AND I.IT_S_GROUP_NO = SQ.CODE_S_CATE) where 1=1
AND IT_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CODE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_VAT_CK LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_SAL_U_PRICE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_SAL_U_PRICE_VAT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_SAL_W_PRICE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_SAL_W_PRICE_VAT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_MONEY_PT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_CARD_PT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR CP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_STD LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_UNIT LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR IT_DATE LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
ORDER BY IT_DATE ASC

SELECT I.IT_NO, I.IT_NM,SQ.CODE_NAME,I.IT_VAT_CK,NVL(I.IT_SAL_U_PRICE,0) AS IT_SAL_U_PRICE, ROUND(I.IT_SAL_U_PRICE*1.1) AS IT_SAL_U_PRICE_VAT, NVL(I.IT_SAL_W_PRICE, 0) AS IT_SAL_W_PRICE , ROUND(NVL(I.IT_SAL_W_PRICE, 0)*1.1) AS IT_SAL_W_PRICE_VAT, I.IT_MONEY_PT,I.IT_CARD_PT,I.CP_NO, CP.CP_NM, I.IT_STD,I.IT_UNIT, TO_CHAR(I.IT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IT_DATE,I.IT_M_GROUP_NO,I.IT_S_GROUP_NO FROM ITEM_CODE I INNER JOIN COMPANY_CODE CP ON I.CP_NO = CP.CP_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE_M_CATE,CODE_S_CATE,CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_L_CATE = 1) SQ ON I.IT_M_GROUP_NO = SQ.CODE_M_CATE AND I.IT_S_GROUP_NO = SQ.CODE_S_CATE WHERE I.IT_NO = #{IT_CODE_NO}
SELECT * FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_L_CATE = 1 AND CODE_S_CATE =0
